p: Doses of 10 5 and 10 6 FFU of ancestral genotype viruses G1(3P+NP)-wt and EG/2013 V627E/ D543E/V655A/R526K caused little body weight change and no mortality ( Fig 6A and 6B, left panels), indicating a relatively avirulent phenotype: the 50% mouse lethal dose (MLD 50) was > 10 6 FFU for both viruses. In contrast, the same doses of current genotype viruses EG/2013-wt and G1(3P+NP) E627V/E543D/A655V/K526R caused drastic weight loss and 60â€“100% mortality, resulting in MLD 50 values of 3.2 x 10 4 FFU and 6.8 x 10 4 FFU, respectively ( Fig 6A and 6B, right panels). Intermediate genotype viruses EG/2013 V627E and G1(3P+NP) E627V had intermediate weight loss and virulence in mice ( Fig 6A and 6B, middle panels).
